structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.catch_line: Rules and regulations as to certification of water treatment and water distribution plant operators.
law.text: The secretary of the Energy and Environment Cabinet, with the advice of the board of certification, shall adopt rules and regulations as are reasonably necessary to carry out the intent of KRS 223.160 to 223.220 and 223.991. The rules and regulations may include, but are not limited to, provisions establishing standards for classification of water treatment plants and water distribution systems, provisions establishing qualifications of applicants and procedures for examination of candidates, membership, and duties of the board of certification, provisions relating to the renewal, cancellation or revocation of certificates, including the specifications of the grounds therefor, and such other provisions as are necessary for the administration of KRS 223.160 to 223.220 and 223.991.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 340, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 48. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(10). -- Amended 1972 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 41. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 156, sec. 5.
